attributes.action: Hold a national enquiry into the widespread abuse of girls by grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to conduct this inquiry to ensure justice for the victims and to address the systemic issues that allowed these horrific abuses to persist, which will allow you to develop effective policies to protect vulnerable individuals in the future. This inquiry is essential not only for the victims and their families but also to restore public trust and confidence in our legal and social systems.
attributes.background: The government should initiate a comprehensive public inquiry into abuse by asian grooming gangs. This inquiry should aim to uncover the systemic failures that allowed such exploitation to occur, hold accountable those who were complicit/negligent, & implement measures to prevent future occurrences.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
